verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bless ye the Lord
Ye who stand in the house of the Lord
Bless ye the Lord
Ye who stand by night
Lift up your hands
In the sanctuary
The Lord who made the universe will bless you out of Zion
Bless ye the Lord ye who serve the Lord
Come on and bless the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord my life to You I bring
A holy, pleasing offering
Mind transformed and not conformed
My heart is full and praise I sing
Come on and...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For Zion's sake I lift my voice
My heart is fixed, I've made my choice
The King of glory shall come in
Lift up your head and welcome Him
Come on and...
